/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC -Wall -Wextra -Wno-unknown-pragmas -fno-strict-aliasing -Wno-format-extra-args -Wno-sign-compare -Wno-invalid-offsetof -Wno-conversion  -march=native -msse4.2 -mfpmath=sse -Wabi -pthread -fopenmp  -Wno-deprecated -O2 -g -DNDEBUG -Wl,--as-needed    -shared -Wl,-soname,libpcl_people.so.1.7 -o ../lib/libpcl_people.so.1.7.2 CMakeFiles/pcl_people.dir/src/hog.cpp.o -lboost_system -lboost_filesystem -lboost_thread -lboost_date_time -lboost_iostreams -lboost_chrono -lpthread -lm -Wl,-rpath,::::::::::::::
